overview.name: Overview
overview.title: PostHog helps {companyName} ship better products, faster.
overview.description: Give your team the tools they need to understand users, test features, and measure impact. One platform instead of multiple tools means less overhead and more shipping.

product_analytics.title: Full visibility into product metrics
product_analytics.description: Track key metrics, build dashboards, and share insights across your team. Know exactly how your product is performing and where to focus engineering efforts.

error_tracking.title: Proactive error monitoring
error_tracking.description: Catch bugs before customers complain. See error rates, stack traces, and affected users. Integrate with your existing workflow and alerting tools.

feature_flags.title: De-risk deployments
feature_flags.description: Ship features behind flags, roll out gradually, and instantly disable problematic code. Your team can ship faster with confidence.

session_replay.title: Debug issues faster
session_replay.description: See exactly what users experienced when they hit a bug. No more back-and-forth with support or trying to reproduce issues.

team_productivity.name: Team Productivity
team_productivity.title: Boost team productivity
team_productivity.description: Replace multiple tools with one platform. Reduce context switching, simplify your tech stack, and let engineers focus on building.

pricing.name: Pricing
pricing.title: Predictable costs
pricing.description: Usage-based pricing with no seat limits. Set billing caps to control costs. Start free and scale as you grow.

cta.name: Get a Demo
cta.title: See PostHog in action
cta.description: Book a demo to see how PostHog can help your engineering team ship better products.
